metadata.description:
To entertain his grandchildren while on a pilgrimage, a well-traveled old man spins a grand tale of swords and sorcery, dragons and demons, revenge, regret and redemption, and above all...love.

Tears of the Dragon is an epic fantasy in the tradition of "The Princess Bride", "Willow", and "The Lord of the Rings", created by Tyler James (The Red Ten) and artist Koko Amboro.
metadata.name: Tears of the Dragon
